title: T206 Mathewson High Grade For Sale or Trade
author: M's_Fan

posts.post_title: T206 Mathewson High Grade For Sale or Trade
posts.post_content:
I'm looking for this card in an SGC 50.  I don't want to waste more money with grading companies trying to cross things over, they never make any sense to me.  So I'd trade for an SGC 50, or I'll accept offers for a straight sale.  Thanks.

[IMG]http://i672.photobucket.com/albums/vv82/3fingerbrown/T206%20HOF%20For%20Sale/Mathewsonwhitecap565psa4.jpg?t=1271964698[/IMG]
